title: Temporary Placeholder For Lunari's 300th Role Because It's Not Done

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may reveal yourself during the day as Temporary Placeholder For Lunari's 300th Role Because It's Not Done.
- Select someone during the day to jail.
- Execute your jailed target. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Gain 3 votes for the rest of the game when you reveal.
- Your jail works exactly like a real Jailor.
- Your kills do not appear as a Jailor.
